title: Loan portfolio management and Liquidity Risk: The impact of limited liability and haircut. (arXiv:2308.06525v1 [q-fin.RM])
abstract: In this article, we consider the problem of a bank's loan portfolio in the context of liquidity risk, while allowing for the limited liability protection enjoyed by the bank. Accordingly, we construct a novel loan portfolio model with limited liability, while maintaining a threshold level of haircut in the portfolio. For the constructed three-time step loan portfolio, at the initial time, the bank raises capital via debt and equity, investing the same in several classes of loans, while at the final time, the bank either meets its liabilities or becomes insolvent. At the intermediate time step, a fraction of the deposits are withdrawn, resulting in liquidation of some of the bank's assets. The liquidated portfolio is designed with the goal of minimizing the liquidation cost. Our theoretical results show that model with the haircut constraint leads to lesser liquidity risk, as compared to the scenario of no haircut constraint being imposed. translated_title: 贷款组合管理和流动性风险：有限责任和折价的影响
translated_abstract: 本文考虑了银行在流动性风险背景下的贷款组合问题，并充分考虑到银行享受的有限责任保护。我们构建了一个新的带有有限责任和折价的贷款组合模型。在初始时间点，银行通过债务和股权筹集资本，并将其投资于几类贷款；而在最后时间点，银行要么满足其债务，要么破产。在中间时间步骤，部分存款被提取，导致银行的一些资产被清算。清算的组合的设计目标是尽量减少清算成本。我们的理论结果表明，带有折价约束的模型相比无折价约束的情况具有较小的流动性风险。最后，我们提供了数值结果来说明这一点。
tldr: 本文构建了一个带有有限责任和折价的贷款组合模型，研究了银行在流动性风险背景下的贷款组合管理问题。实证结果表明，采用折价约束可以降低银行的流动性风险。
